summary: I am a proactive, goal-oriented, and efficient scientist with a strong sense of responsibility who is always open to embracing new challenges and learning opportunities. I have a profound interest in life sciences and drug research. I have experience in the synthesis, (bio)analysis and (biological) assessment of relevant bioactive molecules, from small molecules to proteins.
